testsuite.name: Typed Auth Kafka Client Tests

testcase.name: Handle response - ignores unknown correlation ID
Send request - handles Kafka send failure
Handle response - completes exceptionally for type mismatch
Handle response - completes future for matching correlation ID

testsuite.system-out: 14:45:33.904 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] WARN com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Received response for unknown correlationId: unknown-correlation-id 14:45:34.579 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] WARN com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Request timeout or error for correlationId: fb74a7b2-1361-4039-a42d-d5cab532df29 14:45:34.580 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] ERROR com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Failed to send command: Kafka error 14:45:34.597 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] INFO com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Command sent successfully: correlationId=854adcb8-e649-42bc-b3fe-9168b5d5906c, topic=auth.commands 14:45:34.603 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] WARN com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Type mismatch for correlationId: 854adcb8-e649-42bc-b3fe-9168b5d5906c. Expected: class com.connection.auth.events.responses.TokenValidationResponse, Got: class com.connection.auth.events.responses.ClientUidResponse 14:45:34.603 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] WARN com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Request timeout or error for correlationId: 854adcb8-e649-42bc-b3fe-9168b5d5906c 14:45:34.610 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] INFO com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Command sent successfully: correlationId=7c3af9b9-d584-466e-a506-5b570ce3e119, topic=auth.commands 14:45:34.610 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] INFO com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Response handled successfully: correlationId=7c3af9b9-d584-466e-a506-5b570ce3e119
